title: Apple gives ‘Dream Studio Makeover’ including Mac Studio and Display to up-and-coming creative
content:
Jared Polin of FroKnowsPhoto is a Philadelphia-based YouTuber with a following of over one million. On the channel, Polin uses his extensive photography experience to create “Fun and Informative” videos on the subject. As part of a new “Dream Studio Makeover” project from Apple, Polin got to change the life of a young up-and-coming creative.  

more…

The post Apple gives ‘Dream Studio Makeover’ including Mac Studio and Display to up-and-coming creative appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple reached out to YouTuber FroKnowsPhoto in hopes of giving a “Dream Studio Makeover” for a young creative.
